questionTitle: They were interviewing her for the job . She ____ for the job.
Tom is writing the letter. The letter ____ by Tom.
Everyone understands English. English ____ by everyone.
The employees brought up this issue during the meeting. This issue ____ by the employees during the meeting.
The professor told him not to talk in class. He ____ by the professor not to talk in class.
They say that women are smarter than men. Women ____ to be smarter than men.
The fire has destroyed the house. The house ____ by the fire.
She would have told you. You ____ by her.
She would reject the offer. The offer ____ by her.
This surprises me. I ____ by this.
